payloads.name: Network Port Sweep
payloads.command: echo 'Finding live hosts...' && nmap -sn -PR $TARGET_SUBNET -n -oG - | grep 'Host:' | awk '{print \$2}' | xargs > /tmp/live_hosts.txt && cat /tmp/live_hosts.txt && [ -s /tmp/live_hosts.txt ] && nmap -sS --top-ports $NUM_PORTS -T$TIMING --max-retries $MAX_RETRIES --min-rate=$MIN_RATE -n -iL /tmp/live_hosts.txt -oN /tmp/metapayload_netsweep_$(date +%s).txt || echo 'No live hosts found'
payloads.description: Two-stage scan: fast ARP host discovery, then port scan only live hosts (nmap)
payloads.author: MetaPayload
